|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Fraternal Badge |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Boosts recharge speed by 40% when non-Defenders are targeted. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 7320 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Fraternal Badge |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Boosts recharge speed by 45% when non-Defenders are targeted. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 7320 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Fraternal Badge |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Boosts recharge speed by 50% when non-Defenders are targeted. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 7320 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Fraternal Badges''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{Infobox XC3 Status |title = Freeze |caption = Deals damage at fixed intervals. |image = XC3 Freeze.png |type = Debuff |attribute = Ether |base-duration = 21.5s |max-duration = 43.0s |success-rate = 100% |rng-applicable = No |effect-title-1 = Base Damage (per tick) |effect-value-1 = 6% of Art damage |effect-title-2 = Tick Duration |effect-value-2 = 1.5s }} '''Freeze''' is a [[Status Effect]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. It deals damage at fixed intervals, in addition to slowing the movement of affected characters.
== Distribution == ''This debuff cannot be inflicted by the player's party.'' ===Enemy Arts=== *Ice Pistol ([[Flamii]] family) *Ice Breath ([[Spiralhorn Baccro]], [[Kilocorn Grandeps]]) *Frost Cannon ([[Perilwing Ryuho]]) *Freeze Vortex ([[Moebius H]]) *Blizzard Rush (Moebius H) *Gift of Frost ([[Moebius L]]) *Freezing Rush (Moebius L)
[[Category:XC3 Status]] [[Category:XC3FR Status]]
{{fr stub}}

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Friendship Badge |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Boosts recharge speed by 20% when non-Defenders are targeted. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 2790 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Friendship Badge |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Boosts recharge speed by 25% when non-Defenders are targeted. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 2790 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Friendship Badge |image = XC3 Accessory Medal.png |caption = Boosts recharge speed by 30% when non-Defenders are targeted. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 2790 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Friendship Badges''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

{{for|the class in {{XCX|-}}|Full Metal Jaguar (XCX)}} [[File:XC3 Full Metal Jaguar Weapon Icon.png|thumb|180px|The Full Metal Jaguar Icon]] {{quote|Attacks foes in a wide area with twin guns and drones, the shots growing deadlier with each hit.|Class menu description}} '''Full Metal Jaguar''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|フルメタルジャガー}}, ''Furumetarujagā'') is a [[Keves]]i [[Attacker]] [[Class (XC3)|class]] in {{XC3}}.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hoHvpS2x8us == Overview == Full Metal Jaguars specialize in attacking [[Enemy (XC3)|enemies]] in a wide area with twin guns. Consecutive hits deal increasing damage, however, a missed attack will reset the bonus so a high accuracy is needed to use the class effectively. It is [[Gray]]'s class. It is unlocked by completing the [[Hero Quest]] ''[[A Gray Matter]]''. The [[Class Rank (XC3)|Class Rank]] maximum can be increased to 20 by completing the Ascension Quest ''[[Payback for Treason]]''. {{clr}} ==Class Aptitude and Unlock Requirements== {|class="xc1 centered" style="width:100%; valign:center;" !Party Member |[[File:Icon chara battle n0ah.png|60px]]
'''[[Noah]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 1.png|60px]]
'''[[Mio]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 2.png|60px]]
'''[[Eunie]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 3.png|60px]]
'''[[Taion]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 4.png|60px]]
'''[[Lanz]]''' |[[File:Icon chara battle 5.png|60px]]
'''[[Sena]]''' |- !Aptitude |[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude C Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude S Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude A Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude D Icon.png|35px]]||[[File:XC3 Aptitude B Icon.png|35px]] |- !Class Unlock Points Required |3,400 |5,100 |''Class Inheritor'' |2,550 |5,950 |4,250 |} == Class Rank Requirements == {| class="xc1 centered" width="45%" ! Rank ! CP needed ! Nopon Coin Cost |- | 1 | colspan="2" | None |- | 2 | 210 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 3 | 210 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 2 |- | 4 | 260 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 5 | 260 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 6 | 310 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 7 | 310 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 8 | 340 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 9 | 340 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 3 |- | 10 | 365 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | colspan="3" class="event" | Complete ''[[Payback for Treason]]'' |- | 11 | 340 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 12 | 340 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 13 | 450 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 4 |- | 14 | 450 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 15 | 565 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 16 | 565 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 17 | 675 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 5 |- | 18 | 675 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 19 | 725 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |- | 20 | 840 | [[File:Nopon Coin Silver.png|link=Nopon Coin (Silver)|38px]] x 6 |} {{clr}} == Class Stats == The Full Metal Jaguar class grants the following multipliers to a character's base stats (see their individual pages for their base stats), and sets their Physical and Ether Defense to the following values, depending on their current Rank. Intermediate values are linearly interpolated between the minimum and maximum values, rounding to the nearest percent. {| class="xc1 centered" width="100%" ! Rank !! HP !! Attack !! Healing Power !! Dexterity !! Agility !! Physical Defense !! Ether Defense |- | 1 || 65% || 100% || 40% || 120% || 100% || 10% || 10% |- | 10 || 67% || 105% || 42% || 125% || 105% || 12% || 12% |- | 20 || 70% || 110% || 45% || 130% || 110% || 15% || 15% |} === Weapon Stats === The character's Attack stat after being modified by the above class stats is further modified by adding the class's weapon stat, which depends on the character's [[Level (XC3)|Level]], to obtain the final base Attack stat. These weapon stats also determine the character's Critical Rate and Block Rate. Characters temporarily assume these weapon stats to calculate relevant statistics when using a Master Art from this Class without it being part of a Fusion Art. If a Master Art is used in a Fusion Art, the weapon stats corresponding to the character's current Class will be used instead for calculations. {| class="xc1 centered" width="60%" ! Level !! Attack !! Critical Rate !! Block Rate |- | 1 || 18 || 5% || 5% |- | 10 || 39 || 5% || 5% |- | 20 || 71 || 6% || 6% |- | 30 || 109 || 6% || 6% |- | 40 || 152 || 7% || 7% |- | 50 || 203 || 8% || 8% |- | 60 || 258 || 8% || 8% |- | 70 || 320 || 9% || 9% |- | 80 || 391 || 9% || 9% |- | 90 || 470 || 10% || 10% |- | 99 || 549 || 10% || 10% |} == Arts == * '''[[Violent Streak (XC3)|Violent Streak]]''' ([[Battle Arts (XC3)|Talent Art]]), AOE/Evade/Pierce * [[Demolition]], AOE/Pierce(%) (Rank 1 Master Art) * [[Dead Set]], Removes aggro * [[Quickdraw]], Evade / Front atk ↑ (Rank 10 Master Art) * [[Fatal Barrage]], AOE / Back attack ↑ * [[Superstorm]], High acc. / Eva. down === Hero-Exclusive Arts === * [[Vengeance]], Evade / Front atk ↑ * [[Showdown]], AOE/High acc./ Eva. down * [[Executioner (XC3)|Executioner]], AOE / Back attack ↑ == Class Skills == * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 36.png]] '''Bullet Symphony''': Each attack that hits boosts damage dealt by 10-20% (max. 255%). Missing cancels the boost. * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 37.png]] '''Shock Shot''': Boosts damage against enemies performing Arts by 60-100%. (Rank 15 Master Skill) * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 37.png]] '''Sixth Sense''': Boosts accuracy against enemies performing Arts by 60-100%. * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 0.png]] '''Positioning Pro''': Increases the no. of positional arts that can be set to the Arts Palette by 1. (Rank 5 Master Skill) === Hero-Exclusive Skills === * [[File:XC3 Skill Icon 13.png]] '''Precision Shot''': Boosts accuracy of auto-attacks by 50-150%. === Stat Increases === {| class="xc1 centered" style="width:80%;" !Class Rank !Sixth Sense !Shock Shot !Bullet Symphony !Precision Shot |- | 1 | 60% | 60% | 10% | 50% |- | 5 | 70% | 70% | 12% | 75% |- | 10 | 80% | 80% | 15% | 100% |- | 15 | 90% | 90% | 17% | 125% |- | 20 | 100% | 100% | 20% | 150% |} == Gallery == XC3 Gray Artwork.png|Gray, a Full Metal Jaguar XC3 Gray screenshot 01.jpg XC3 Gray screenshot 02.jpg XC3 Gray screenshot 03.jpg XC3 Gray screenshot 04.jpg FMJ Noah.png|Noah as a Full Metal Jaguar FMJ Mio.png|Mio as a Full Metal Jaguar FMJ Eunie.png|Eunie as a Full Metal Jaguar FMJ Taion.png|Taion as a Full Metal Jaguar FMJ Lanz.png|Lanz as a Full Metal Jaguar FMJ Sena.png|Sena as a Full Metal Jaguar == References == {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Classes]]

It can be purchased from [[Prize X-change Red]] in the [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] for 6000 [[Noponstone]]s. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} Category:XC3 Accessori..."
